Description: A small ivory label with a hole in the top left-hand corner for attachment. The front surface bears an incised inscription. Good condition, repaired from two fragments.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: W. M. F. Petrie, 'Royal Tombs of the Earliest Dynasties' II, pl. III, 10; P. Kaplony, 'Die Inschriften der Ägyptischen Frühzeit II (Wiesbaden, 1964), 902, n. 1185.
